price: O gökte de ilâh olandır/ibadet olunandır, yerde de ilâhtır/ibadet olunandır. O Hakîmdir, Alîmdir.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ إِلَٰهٞ وَفِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِلَٰهٞۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī fī al-samāi ilāhun wafī al-arḍi ilāhun wahuwa al-ḥakīmu al-ʿalīmu
